summary: In a chain of unfortunate events, a 17-year-old schoolgirl narrowly escapes a possible rapist, is caught up in a terror attack, and drinks contaminated water that poisons her.
cast: Salman Khan|Sneha Ullal|Mithun Chakraborty|Kader Khan|Navni Parihar|Ravi Baswani|Vikram Gokhale|Mumait Khan|Aira Ollila|Priyanka Shinoy|Michail Solovieu|Meher Vij|Camila Bordonaba
title: Lucky: No Time for Love
